name: Archer Hero
description:
It's just a demo game to develop creative mechanics for archery. I hope you enjoy killing boss with archery mechanics.

Hold mouse left button to stretch and relase button to shoot arrow. 

Basic Arrow (1)

Stretching is fast but damage is low and stabile.

Teleport Arrow(2)

Hold mouse left button to stretch and relase button to shoot arrow. Then you can click right mouse button to swap you location with arrow in a short time period. Has no damage.

Heavy Arrow (4)

Stretching is slow, but damage change according to stretching and pushes enemies away from you.

Rain Arrow (3)

Click left mouse button to throw first arrow that is pin point for rain arrow attack. To call rain arrow attack click right mouse button after pin arrow stall some surface.

How to Control?

A,D,Space                                        : Jump and Move

Mouse Position                            : Aim

Hold Left Mouse Button         : Streching Bow

Relaise Left Mouse BUtton   : Shoot Arrow

1,2,3,4                                                : Swap arrows that has diffirent abilities

Shift                                                     : Dash
